headline: Herc Holdings Inc. Announces Election of Two New Independent Directors to its Board of Directors
summary: BONITA SPRINGS, Fla., November 24, 2025--Herc Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: HRI) ("Herc Holdings" or "the Company"), one of North America’s leading equipment rental suppliers operating through Herc Rentals Inc., today announced the election of two new independent directors: John Olin, executive vice president and chief financial officer at Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies Corporation, and Patrick Shannon, former senior vice president and chief financial officer at Allegion plc.
